definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: The video introduces pre-writing by showing the strokes needed to form letters.
sentences.chinese: 這個碟片通過展示組成單詞的一筆一畫來介紹寫字的。

sentences.english: Magnetic slot-in loader, second to none, perfect protection to disc.
sentences.chinese: 磁力吸入式，全球首創，保護碟片好。

sentences.english: Please watch TV , sing the song together.
sentences.chinese: 請學生觀看碟片，學唱歌曲。

sentences.english: He took a step forward, and one of the disks shimmered.
sentences.chinese: 博茲朝前走上一步，接着某一塊碟片閃出微光。

sentences.english: Good thermal contact between homogenate and the surface of the disc is required.
sentences.chinese: 並在勻漿和碟片的表面之間需要有良好的熱接觸。

sentences.english: Please make sure that the correct floppy is in the drive.
sentences.chinese: 請確認軟碟機中是否已放入了正確的磁碟片。

sentences.english: Computer Science The plastic or cardboard container that holds a floppy disk.
sentences.chinese: 裝軟磁碟片的塑料套或紙板套。

sentences.english: Discs currently have three spatial dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 目前的碟片有三維空間。

sentences.english: Even in this case there is the possibility that the CD is Readable.
sentences.chinese: 不過光碟片仍然有可能讀得出來。

sentences.english: Alcohol is a powerful solvent, perfectly capable of dissolving fingerprints and grime on the surface of a disc.
sentences.chinese: 酒精是強力溶劑，對碟片上的指紋和灰塵有絕佳效果。

sentences.english: We encourage guardians to perform the activities shown in the video with their children.
sentences.chinese: 我們鼓勵家長來重複碟片中所展示的兒童活動。

definition: compact disc/CD or DVD/CD ROM/CL:片[pian4],張|张[zhang1]
